statements: DELETE FROM BiopharmaceuticalProducts WHERE product_id = 101 AND expiration_date < '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM BiopharmaceuticalProducts WHERE manufacturer = 'BioTech' AND storage_temperature > 4.5;
DELETE FROM Distribution WHERE id = 10 AND location = 'Warehouse 1';
DELETE FROM Storage WHERE temperature > 25.0 AND humidity < 50.0;
DELETE FROM product_distribution WHERE quantity <= 10 AND distribution_date < '2022-06-01';
DELETE FROM Shipments WHERE product_id = 100 AND quantity > 50;
